description: KPIT Technologies is a global partner to the automotive and mobility ecosystem for making software-defined vehicles a reality. It is a leading independent software development and integration partner helping mobility leapfrog towards a clean, smart, and safe future. With 11,000+ automobelievers across the globe specializing in embedded software, AI, and digital solutions, KPIT accelerates its clients’ implementation of next-generation technologies for the future mobility roadmap. With engineering centers in Europe, the USA, Japan, China, Thailand, and India, KPIT works with leaders in automotive and mobility and is present where the ecosystem is transforming.

In today’s rapidly advancing automotive world, safety isn’t just about airbags and seatbelts — it’s about understanding the driver. What if your car could assess your emotional state, predict fatigue, and respond in real time to keep you safe? 

Join us at ELIV - Electronics in Vehicles 2024, where our expert Mr. Gowrishankar S, discusses the future of smart automotive cabins. Get to know how AI and machine learning are transforming vehicles by monitoring driver behaviour, integrating physiological data like heart rate and temperature with vehicle patterns, and enabling intelligent responses that ensure a safer and more comfortable journey. 

Curious to learn more? See you at ELIV 2024! 

16th October 2024 
Time : 11.45 am to 12.15 pm (German Time) 
Place: Wien (Ground floor)

We are proud to announce that our Aikyam, a brand-new auditorium project at our Pune Campus has been awarded the The Economic Times DesignScape Award in the Iconic Projects category! 
 
This recognition celebrates innovation and sustainability, embodying our vision of creating spaces that promote unity and collaboration for our diverse community. 
 
Aikyam, designed with Shell Elemental STAD Analysis and featuring 100% fresh air circulation, is a nurturing ground for ideas and creativity. We thank our partners at Venkataramanan Associates for their collaboration in this journey.
